solution_line_template: The second competitor can eat {first_competitor_rate} x {second_competitor_multiplier} = <<{first_competitor_rate}*{second_competitor_multiplier}={second_competitor_rate}>>{second_competitor_rate} hotdogs per minute.

The third competitor can eat {second_competitor_rate} x {third_competitor_multiplier} = <<{second_competitor_rate}*{third_competitor_multiplier}={third_competitor_rate}>>{third_competitor_rate} hot dogs per minute.

Therefore, the third competitor can eat {third_competitor_rate} x {time_minutes} = <<{third_competitor_rate}*{time_minutes}={total_hotdogs_third_competitor}>>{total_hotdogs_third_competitor} hot dogs after {time_minutes} minutes.
